name: Treachery
description:
Controls

ControlKey InputMovementW, A, S, D or arrow keysAttackSpaceFire (not available at start)EnterMenu tab or esc

You only go in turn based combat when near enemies. Use all attack and movement to end your turn.

If you back stab an enemy you will do double damage.

Defeat your way through the nine  three layers of hell to escape and be alive once more.

This was a re-imagining of the game we made for our first ever game jam back in 2016. I think we've gotten better in the last 5 years, but you can look at the old game, and judge for yourself if you want https://globalgamejam.org/2016/games/treachery

Known Issues

Impossible dungeon - It's possible to get a pit in front of a door you have to go through. If you can't fly yet, then this dungeon is impossible... sorry.

Speedy bois - Enemies will sometimes have excessive movement and will run right up to you. Not attack though so it's not a death sentence.

Hiding behind rocks - certain enemies can go onto rocks that shouldn't be able to.

Extra Items - UI doesn't reset properly on retry so it will say you have items you don't

Projectiles not dissapearing - some projectiles don't ever dissapear, even after re-loading

Rare - Getting locked in a room. It is possible for you to get stuck in a room because it locks you in for no reason.

Camera not snapping - On a restarting game from main menu the camera won't snap to rooms
